channel.title: hunters village
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "hunters village" - the first and only existing mercenary village which offers it's services to all.

item.title: Re: hunters village
item.content:encoded: This seems very interesting. Hmm i dont need help currently, but i will make sure i keep you in mind if i do. I would like to ask how much 3 members would cost for The Hyuga. I am not kage but i made village. Im out and will be kage soon. I am current kage of The Uchiha and ex:kage slash co-kage of Nendo.

item.title: hunters village
item.content:encoded:
our village offers it's services for anyone who can pay.

services include:
-Bingoes
-Bongo Locks*
-Raids
-Invasions*
-Sabotages (Not currently Available)*
-Supply Runs
-Membership boosts*
-Kaiju Support

*Only available to Kages

payment is carried out via the item mailing/ bucket option, or if your paying with village contracts, then you have to come to the village to drop them off.

if you are interested in joining to offer your services, send in an applicaton to hunters village: the village hidden in the contract.

for more information, and to comission contracts, go to our forum:
http://z10.invisionfree.com/Mercenary_Village/index.php?&act=idx
